# Description of visit numbers
```{r}
df_visits_pr_patient <- df_outpatient_preprocessed %>% 
  group_by(dw_ek_borger) %>% 
  summarise(n_visits = n())

skim(df_visits_pr_patient$n_visits)

median(df_visits_pr_patient$n_visits)
```
